summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QSR Loyalty App for 'The Waffle Pop Co'. All core features working perfectly including customer registration/login, 5-tier reward system, admin dashboard, Perfect 10 Game, and leaderboard functionality.
passed_tests: Backend API - All 17 endpoints (100% success rate)
Admin login rejection with wrong password
5-tier reward system display (200pts=10% voucher, 400pts=Free Triangle Waffle, 500pts=Popsicle Waffle, 600pts=6pc Pancake, 800pts=Choice of Waffle OR 10pc Pancake)
Redeem button disabled when insufficient points
Complete redemption workflow with point deduction and reward code generation
Leaderboard displays users ranked by lifetime points
Perfect 10 Game - start/stop timer functionality with result display
Admin dashboard - add points to users
Admin redemption tracker - view and mark redemptions as claimed
End-to-end integration: customer redemption → admin tracking → mark as claimed
